remarks: The algebraic span of a subalgebra is itself.  ( ~ spanid analog.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 7-Jan-2015.)
statement:
aspval.a $e |- A = ( AlgSpan ` W ) $.
aspval.v $e |- V = ( Base ` W ) $.
aspval.l $e |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) $.
aspid $p |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> ( A ` S ) = S ) $.
